text: Géza Szőcs (21 August 1953 – 5 November 2020) was a Hungarian poet and politician. He was from Transylvania, Romania. He was Secretary of State for Culture of the Ministry of National Resources in Hungary from 2 June 2010 to 13 June 2012. Szőcs was infected during the COVID-19 pandemic in Hungary in October 2020. He was hospitalized in Budapest and died on 5 November 2020 from the infection, aged 67. :Sr:Геза Сзоцс ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Hungarian politicians Category:Hungarian poets Category:Romanian poets Category:Romanian politicians Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Budapest
title: Géza Szőcs
